trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 代表將處理的方法<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> class is raised whenever an input character does not match its corresponding element in the input mask.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>類別輸入的字元不符合輸入遮罩中相對應的元素時引發。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected> event.
When you create a MaskInputRejectedEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 MaskInputRejectedEventHandler 委派時，您可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。
